alert.note: Alert for Clark; Dallas; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 7:42PM CDT until October 12 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Ouachita County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 742 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Whelen Springs, or 15 miles east of Prescott, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Camden... Gurdon... Chidester... Whelen Springs... Beirne... Poison Springs State Park... Cullendale... White Oak Lake State Park... East Camden... Amy... Burtsell... Eagle Mills... Harmony Grove... Reader... Vaden... Fairview in Ouachita County... Warner... Tates Bluff... Bragg City... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
